title: Design a KPI Dashboard
description: An agent must design the layout and content for a new executive KPI dashboard.

tasks.description: Based on a list of available metrics, select the top 5-7 most important KPIs for an executive audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects high-level metrics like 'Total Revenue', 'Net Profit Margin', and 'Customer Acquisition Cost'.

tasks.description: For each selected KPI, suggest the best visualization type (e.g., 'Line Chart' for trends, 'Gauge' for current status, 'Bar Chart' for comparisons).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends appropriate chart types for each KPI.

tasks.description: Create a text-based description of the dashboard layout, arranging the visualizations in a logical grid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent describes a clean and readable dashboard layout.
